Services

Translation & Interpretation

×

Translation & Interpretation

My experience in translation and interpretation ensures clear communication. From translating blockbuster movies for Netflix and commercial translation for huge brands like Lazada and Alibaba to handling legal documents and contacts, I have a wide range of skills in translation and a deep understanding of the English and Thai languages. More than just translating word for word, I can help you communicate effectively in every situation.

Administration

×

Administration

Whether in your business or private life, I am able to assist you in a broad range of tasks. Need a receptionist, recruiter or bookkeeper? As your virtual assistant in Thailand I can do all the above and more.

Business Setup

×

Business Setup

Setting up a business in Thailand can be a challenge for foreigners, but I’m here to guide you through the process from start to finish. As your personal assistant in Thailand I will help you to be prepared for every step so everything goes smoothly. I have years of experience dealing with lawyers and government officials, especially in the real estate industry.

Social Media Management

×

Social Media Management

Social media is an important aspect of any modern business and I can save you time by creating and posting content to your most important networks. Don’t have accounts set up? As your personal assistant in Thailand i can help you get started on platforms like Facebook, Instagram and Pinterest to reach a wider audience.

And much more, including litigation, family law,
